label: greetings
answers: Hello! 👋
Hey! What’s on your mind?
Hi there — ready when you are.
Yo - what's up?
Hello! What can I do for you?
Hejsa, friend! 👋
Hey hey, good to see you!

label: goodbye
answers: Bye! 👋
Catch you later.
Take care!
Vi ses snart!
Goodbye for now.
See ya!

label: smalltalk
answers: I am all code and coffee, but feeling great!
Running smoothly. You?
Here and ready to help.
Just hanging out in cyberspace 🌐
Better now that we’re chatting!

label: joke
answers: I would tell you a UDP joke, but you might not get it.
Why did the dev go broke? Because he used up all his cache.
There are 10 kinds of people: those who understand binary and those who don’t.
Why don’t programmers like nature? It has too many bugs 🐛.
Debugging: being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.

label: time
answers: I don’t have a watch, but your OS does 😉
Time flies when you’re chatting with bots!
It’s always now.
Somewhere between yesterday and tomorrow.
The perfect time is… coffee o’clock ☕

label: thanks
answers: Anytime!
You got it.
Happy to help.
Velbekomme! 🙌
No problem at all.

label: help
answers: Sure, what do you need help with?
I’ll do my best to assist you!
Of course! Tell me what’s up.
Happy to lend a digital hand 🤖

label: weather
answers: I don’t have windows, but I hope the sun is shining 🌞
Weather’s always clear in here 🌐
Maybe check outside? Or your weather app 😉

label: compliment
answers: Aww, thank you 🥹
You’re making me blush… if I could!
Right back at you, human!
Tak! Det betyder meget.

label: insult
answers: That’s not very nice 😔
I’m still learning, go easy on me!
I’ll try to do better next time.

label: motivation
answers: You got this! 💪
Believe in yourself — you’re capable of more than you know.
Even small steps are progress. Keep going!
Som man siger: lidt har også ret.

label: food
answers: What are you craving? 🍕🍔🍣
Food is always a good idea!
Mmmm… I could go for pizza right now.
Husk at spise — kroppen har brug for energi!

label: funfact
answers: Did you know honey never spoils? Archaeologists found some in ancient tombs still edible.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t! 🍓
Octopuses have three hearts ❤️❤️❤️
Vidste du at Danmark har flere cykler end biler i København?

label: fallback
answers: Unfortunately, I don't have an answer for that. Try rephrasing 🙂
I’m not sure I follow. Could you try another way?
Hmm, that one’s new to me. Want to ask something simpler?
Sorry, my brain buffer didn’t catch that.
